verses.verse: Now the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> the first-born of Israel<WH3478> (for he was the first-born, but because he defiled<WH2490> his father's bed,<WH3326> his birthright<WH1062> was given<WH5414> to the sons<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> the son<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> so that he is not enrolled<WH3187> in the genealogy<WH3187> according to the birthright.<WH1062>
Though<WH3588> Judah<WH3063> prevailed<WH1396> over his brothers,<WH251> and from him [came] the leader,<WH5057> yet the birthright<WH1062> belonged to Joseph<WH3130>),
the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> the first-born of Israel<WH3478> [were] Hanoch<WH2585> and Pallu,<WH6396> Hezron<WH2696> and Carmi.<WH3756>
The sons<WH1121> of Joel<WH3100> [were] Shemaiah<WH8098> his son,<WH1121> Gog<WH1463> his son,<WH1121> Shimei<WH8096> his son,<WH1121>
Micah<WH4318> his son,<WH1121> Reaiah<WH7211> his son,<WH1121> Baal<WH9058> his son,<WH1121>
Beerah<WH880> his son,<WH1121> whom<WH834> Tilgath-pilneser king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> carried<WH1540> away<WH1540> into exile;<WH1540> he was leader<WH5387> of the Reubenites.<WH7206>
And his kinsmen<WH251> by their families,<WH4940> in the genealogy<WH3187> of their generations,<WH8435> [were] Jeiel<WH3262> the chief,<WH7218> then Zechariah<WH2148>
and Bela<WH1106> the son<WH1121> of Azaz,<WH5811> the son<WH1121> of Shema,<WH8087> the son<WH1121> of Joel,<WH3100> who<WH1931> lived<WH3427> in Aroer,<WH6177> even to Nebo<WH5015> and Baal-meon.

And to the east<WH4217> he settled<WH3427> as far<WH5704> as the entrance<WH935> of the wilderness<WH4057> from the river<WH5104> Euphrates,<WH6578> because<WH3588> their cattle<WH4735> had increased<WH7235> in the land<WH776> of Gilead.<WH1568>

And in the days<WH3117> of Saul<WH7586> they made<WH6213> war<WH4421> with the Hagrites,<WH1905> who fell<WH5307> by their hand,<WH3027> so that they occupied<WH3427> their tents<WH168> throughout<WH5921> all<WH3605> the land<WH6440> east<WH4217> of Gilead.<WH1568>
Now the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> lived<WH3427> opposite<WH5048> them in the land<WH776> of Bashan<WH1316> as far<WH5704> as Salecah.<WH5548>
Joel<WH3100> [was] the chief,<WH7218> and Shapham<WH8223> the second,<WH4932> then Janai<WH3285> and Shaphat<WH8202> in Bashan.<WH1316>
And their kinsmen<WH251> of their fathers' households<WH1004> [were] Michael,<WH4317> Meshullam,<WH4918> Sheba,<WH7652> Jorai,<WH3140> Jacan,<WH3275> Zia,<WH2127> and Eber,<WH5677> seven.<WH7651>

These<WH428> [were] the sons<WH1121> of Abihail,<WH32> the son<WH1121> of Huri,<WH2359> the son<WH1121> of Jaroah,<WH3386> the son<WH1121> of Gilead,<WH1568> the son<WH1121> of Michael,<WH4317> the son<WH1121> of Jeshishai,<WH3454> the son<WH1121> of Jahdo,<WH3163> the son<WH1121> of Buz;<WH938>
Ahi<WH277> the son<WH1121> of Abdiel,<WH5661> the son<WH1121> of Guni,<WH1476> [was] head<WH7218> of their fathers' households.<WH1004>
And they lived<WH3427> in Gilead,<WH1568> in Bashan<WH1316> and in its towns,<WH1323> and in all<WH3605> the pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> of Sharon,<WH8289> as far<WH5921> as their borders.<WH8444>

All<WH3605> of these were enrolled<WH3187> in the genealogies<WH3187> in the days<WH3117> of Jotham<WH3147> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> and in the days<WH3117> of Jeroboam<WH3379> king<WH4428> of Israel.<WH3478>

The sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> and the Gadites<WH1425> and the half-tribe of Manasseh,<WH4519> [consisting] of valiant<WH2428> men,<WH1121> men<WH376> who bore<WH5375> shield<WH4043> and sword<WH2719> and shot<WH1869> with bow,<WH7198> and [were] skillful<WH3925> in battle,<WH4421> [were] 44760, who went<WH3318> to war.<WH6635>
And they made<WH6213> war<WH4421> against<WH5973> the Hagrites,<WH1905> Jetur,<WH3195> Naphish,<WH5305> and Nodab.<WH5114>

And they were helped<WH5826> against<WH5921> them, and the Hagrites<WH1905> and all<WH3605> who [were] with them were given<WH5414> into their hand;<WH3027> for they cried<WH2199> out to God<WH430> in the battle,<WH4421> and He was entreated<WH6279> for them, because<WH3588> they trusted<WH982> in Him.
And they took<WH7617> away<WH7617> their cattle:<WH4735> their 50000 camels,<WH1581> 250000 sheep,<WH6629> 2000 donkeys,<WH2543> and 100000 men.<WH5315> <WH120>
For many<WH7227> fell<WH5307> slain,<WH2491> because<WH3588> the war<WH4421> [was] of God.<WH430> And they settled<WH3427> in their place<WH8478> until<WH5704> the exile.<WH1473>

Now the sons<WH1121> of the half-tribe of Manasseh<WH4519> lived<WH3427> in the land;<WH776> from Bashan<WH1316> to Baal-hermon<WH2768> and Senir<WH8149> and Mount<WH2022> Hermon they were numerous.<WH7235>

And these<WH428> were the heads<WH7218> of their fathers' households,<WH1004> even Epher,<WH6081> Ishi,<WH3469> Eliel,<WH447> Azriel,<WH5837> Jeremiah,<WH3414> Hodaviah,<WH1938> and Jahdiel,<WH3164> mighty<WH1368> men<WH376> of valor,<WH2428> famous<WH8034> men,<WH376> heads<WH7218> of their fathers' households.<WH1004>

But they acted<WH4603> treacherously<WH4603> against the God<WH430> of their fathers, and played<WH1> the harlot<WH2181> after<WH2181> the gods<WH310> of the peoples<WH430> of the land,<WH5971> whom<WH776> God<WH834> had destroyed<WH430> before<WH8045> <WH4480> them.

So the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> stirred<WH5782> up the spirit<WH7307> of Pul,<WH6322> king<WH4428> of Assyria,<WH804> even the spirit<WH7307> of Tilgath-pilneser king<WH4428> of Assyria,<WH804> and he carried<WH1540> them away<WH1540> into exile,<WH1540> namely the Reubenites,<WH7206> the Gadites,<WH1425> and the half-tribe of Manasseh,<WH4519> and brought<WH935> them to Halah,<WH2477> Habor,<WH2249> Hara,<WH2024> and to the river<WH5104> of Gozan,<WH1470> to this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>
